aka: Voyage au centre de la Terre
this_title: Journey to the Centre of the Earth
trans_title: Voyage au centre de la Terre
introduction: Producers Slim Film + Television and Federation Entertainment announce that they teaming on another adaptation of a Verne classic, Journey to the Centre of the Earth, with Ashley Pharoah showrunning.Journey to the Centre of the Earth follows Professor Lidenbrock, an adventurous geology professor who chances upon a manuscript in which a 16th century explorer claims to have found a route to the earth’s core. The Professor leads a life-threatening expedition that will unearth secrets about the origins of humanity and its future.
foreign_title: Journey to the Centre of the Earth
